content:
Sure! Here is a summary of the elements:

* "b0" is a Shape with a white background and gray border, used to frame the entire page.
* "b1" is a Shape with a pink background, used as a header at the top of the page.
* "b2" is a Text element containing the title "Wedding Invitation", which is positioned on top of the pink Shape element.
* "b3" is a Text element containing the names of the couple getting married, positioned underneath the pink Shape element.
* "b4" is a Text element containing the date and time of the wedding, positioned underneath the names of the couple.
* "b5" is a Shape with a light gray background, used as a container for the RSVP form.
* "b6" is a Text element containing the RSVP form title "Please RSVP by May 1st, 2023", positioned on top of the light gray Shape element.
* "b7" is a Text element containing the question "Will you attend the wedding?", positioned underneath the RSVP form title.
* "b8" is a Button element with the text "Yes" and a light green background, positioned underneath the "Will you attend the wedding?" question.
* "b9" is a Button element with the text "No" and a light red background, positioned to the right of the "Yes" button.
* "b10" is a Shape with a light blue background, used as a container for the wedding details.
* "b11" is a Text element containing the title "Wedding Details", positioned on top of the light blue Shape element.
* "b12" is a Text element containing the address of the wedding venue, positioned underneath the wedding details title.
* "b13" is a Text element containing the dress code for the wedding, positioned underneath the address of the wedding venue.
* "b14" is a Button element with the text "Directions", positioned underneath the dress code.

I hope this summary is helpful!
